divs: Sighting DetailsWell i was sitting by my computer looking at ufo sightings at approximate 10:45 and i looked out the window and was just looking. First i noticed the TV on in someone's house. Then a plane was flying by. Then i saw a "white dot". I told myself i am just hallucinating but then the "white dot" just jolted downward and i lost sight of the object. I felt strange as if someone was staring at me at the time of the sighting. I did not capture it with my camera due to the fact that it did not want to turn on.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around January 15th 2009
Summary: I just saw a ball and then it went fast down.
